p: Thujone is the monoterpene found in the composition of many plants including Thuja occidentalis. However, the use of this compound is regulated by the European Parliament and Council and the European Medicines Agency [ 67]. The isomers α-thujone and β-thujone are monoterpene ketones, with the following IUPAC name: (1 S,4 R,5 R)-4-methyl-1-(propane-2-yl) bicyclo (3.1.0) hexan-3-one [ 67].
